page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW OF M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: Agriculture dominates the area of study. Allied industries, hauleage contractors, and a large garage and engineering works in Market Weighton are the other main employers. People who moved to the area, due to low rateable values, are usually white-collar workers and commute to work in nearby cities and towns. These new inhabitants are responsible for a more aspiring attitude to life. A Sports Centre was built as a result of this changing outlook. Although the agricultural market has ceased, many hostelries remain and are the focal point of adult entertainment. Some recent building developments have marred the character of some areas. Conservation orders have protected buildings for posterity. Essentially, the community is isolated by geography and insular by its very nature.
